## CircularDepError class

Custom error class for circular dependency detection.

 {<!-- -->string\[\]<!-- -->} dependencyChain - The full chain of dependencies leading to the circular reference  {<!-- -->string\[\]<!-- -->} circularPath - The specific path that forms the circular reference

 getDetailedMessage - Returns a formatted string with error details including dependency chain and circular path  toJSON - Converts error to JSON format for logging purposes

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CircularDepError extends Error 
```
**Extends:** Error

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
